title: About Me
text: I’m a Statistics MSc student at ETH Zurich with a passion for applying advanced statistical methods and machine learning to solve real-world problems, particularly in climate science and healthcare.

title: About Me
text: I’m a Statistics MSc student at ETH Zurich with a passion for applying advanced statistical methods and machine learning to solve real-world problems, particularly in climate science and healthcare.

title: About Me
text:
Research Interests
My research focuses on the intersection of machine learning and climate science. Currently, I’m working as a Visiting Graduate Researcher at IBM Research’s AI for Climate Impact Lab, where I contribute to advanced climate modeling research using artificial intelligence.
Previously, I developed a machine learning framework for climate downscaling at ETH Zurich, integrating generative models to produce high-resolution forecasts from global climate models. My work on Corrective Diffusion Models improved MSE by 15% over existing methods.
I’m also interested in:

Deep learning applications in healthcare
Concept Bottleneck Models for Continual Learning
High-dimensional statistics and computer vision
Statistical modeling for environmental data

title: About Me
text:
Education

MSc in Statistics (2023 - Present)
ETH Zurich, Switzerland
Focus: Deep Learning, High-Dimensional Statistics, Computer Vision, Machine Learning
BSc in Statistics (2020 - 2023)
Università degli Studi di Padova, Italy
Focus: Statistical Modelling, Multivariate Statistics, Time Series

title: About Me
text:
Professional Experience
As a Data Scientist at the Center of Dental Medicine Zurich, I deployed large language models to classify medical publications based on their adherence to good clinical practices and designed experiments to assist doctors in publication processes.
My research experience spans multiple projects:

Development of machine learning frameworks for climate downscaling
Implementation of Concept Bottleneck Models for Continual Learning
Creation of predictive models for crop yield estimation using drone imagery
Application of deep learning for heart disease prediction and pneumonia detection
Development of novel approaches for evaluating functional diagnostic tests

title: About Me
text:
Technical Skills

Programming: Python, R, SQL
ML Frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow
Operating Systems: Windows, Linux

title: About Me
text:
Beyond Academia
When I’m not immersed in research and statistics, I’m passionate about environmental conservation and staying active through climbing, rowing, and CrossFit.
Feel free to reach out if you’re interested in collaborating on research projects or just want to connect!
